body:
The bug is here: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/autograd/_functions/linalg.py#L13

It needs to call: `return input.diag(self.diagonal_idx)` and similarly in the backward it has to call `return grad_output.diag(self.diagonal_idx)`
